segments.text: The woman by the sink seems so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing and spilling all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on the stool to reach the cookie jar, and it looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbly and could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie, looking so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are trying to sneak cookies without the woman knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so calm and tidy compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman isn't paying attention to the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter look like they might fall into the water and break.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet soon before it causes a bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's dress and apron look neat, but her surroundings are getting wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR
